page.title: 10Peoples Views on our Town
page.content: On our survey we visited 119 houses, and found that,although not many people had been born here,most people had lived in the town for over 20 years.All of the towns from where they had come were in the north of England. Most people had moved to our town to get a job,and were happy with our houses and gardens,and liked this area of the town.Nearly everyone liked the trees and open spaces and used the leisure facilities,especially the recreation centre,the sports complex and the library.Everyone went shopping in the town centre,but thought that more shops and more seats would improve the place.Three people would like to scrap the Development Corporation,and one man said we should shoot all of the councillors!
